(OOC: I want to bring in a new character. I already have an idea..)
  -----=
 Original Message ----- 
  From: THECODE 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent:=
 Thursday, June 29, 2000 9:08 PM
  Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


  Stranato=
 was confused now, this bot seemed to die sad. First he wanted to die, he s=
hould have been happy, but he seemed so sad to die, the knife had no affect=
, he froze to death. Stranato sighed, this was the part of his job he hated=
. Stranato picked up Drazom's body and carried it back to the Radicon's wre=
cked ship, which served as their base. Stranato set Drazom's body on a tabl=
e.

  "Any way we can bring him back? We can reprogram him to serve us." St=
ranato said.

  "I don't think so, his spark looks to be extinguished, sorr=
y poor fellow, we couldn't save ya." Train Wreck said.

  "I shouldn't have=
 stabbed him." Stranato said.

  "It wasn't you who killed him, he froze to=
 death, just sorry he didn't make it." Train Wreck said.

  "No, you don't =
understand, I tried to kill him, I'm no better than the cold! I don't under=
stand why I did something like that, maybe it was the cold." Stranato said.=
 He sighed.

  "Maybe I'm just a son of a--"

  "No, you are acting stupid =
now! Your murderer curcuits blocked out your intelligence circuits and your=
 logic circuits." Train Wreck said, interupting Stranato.

  "I hope your r=
ight." Stranato said. Train Wreck looked at the body.

  "We could always p=
ut a new spark in his body" Train Wreck said. Stranato sighed and sat in th=
e corner.

  "We could have used him, and instead we let him die and didn't=
 save him, and I tried to kill him myself." Stranato said.

  OCC: Orchid, =
the Radicons could put a new spark from their spark collection (From deathm=
atches!) into Drazom's body if you want to have a new character with Drazom=
s body, Orchid. Orchid, I could have them change the body and you can bring=
 in a new character without having him or her look like Drazom at all, your=
 choice, you can just have them get rid of his body even, just pick somethi=
ng, please...
    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: ilovealllizards 
=
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    Sent: Thursday, June 29, 2000 8:37 PM
    S=
ubject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


    *The knife hit Drazom's back. He didn't sc=
ream or anything. It was already snowing which made him even colder. Mech f=
luid begins pouring out of his back* Drazom:............ *Drazom's head hit=
s the ground. It wasn't really the knife. It was coldness. Drazom's spark f=
ades out and he lies there......and mutters one word..* Drazom:....Mantella=
....... *Drazom's optics flicker and fade out* *He lived to love....he live=
d to die.....That was a queston that would never be answered*





    (OOC=
: Please Drazom on the Deceased bots page. as that he died from the lack of=
 emch fluid and because of how cold it was)
      ----- Original Message --=
--- 
      From: THECODE 
      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
      Sent: Thursda=
y, June 29, 2000 6:54 PM
      Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


      The Radi=
cons had walked off and left Drazom, but now they were walking back and the=
y seen him again. Airbomber laughed.

      "There's the guy I saved, I won=
der why he wants to die?" Airbomber asked.

      "I don't know, but I will=
 oblige his needs!" Stranato said. Stranato walked up behind Drazom slowly.=
 Stranato pulled out a knife, something he had stolen from the People's Bas=
e, and plunged it down, the knife screaming toward Drazom's back.

      St=
ronghold and Blender took a sip of their beer.

      "Why does that guy wa=
nt to die, though?" Arrow asked.

      "Some bots are crazy." Train Wreck =
said, the 5 Radicons watching Stranato...
        ----- Original Message --=
--- 
        From: ilovealllizards 
        To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
       =
 Sent: Wednesday, June 28, 2000 7:01 PM
        Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars=



        *Drazom slowly turns his head and looks at The Radicons* Drazom:=
....no......I must...die for.....my stupidity...of....messing up with......=
Mantella..... *Drazom's optics widen as he remembers something* Drazom:...h=
ey....I'm a Pred.....I AM!.....kill me........*Drazom pulls hisself up by a=
 tree limb and mech fluid pours out of his side and he falls back to the gr=
ound shivering from how cold it is getting from the lack of mech fluid*
   =
       ----- Original Message ----- 
          From: THECODE 
          To:=
 nbwrpg@egroups.com 
          Sent: Tuesday, June 27, 2000 10:59 PM
      =
    Subject: Neo Beast Wars


          Train Wreck walked away from the ba=
ttle, Plintissa and Stronghold run away. Stranato, not seeing any point in =
continuing the battle, ran off with them. Scamrock followed with a grunt fr=
om being outnumbered. Artist laughed and ran after them as well.

         =
 "Know what my names gonna be now? I'm going to be Blender!" Scamrock said.=


          "Who cares about you?" Stranato asked. Stronghold reached out t=
o grab Stranato but he cartwheeled out of the way.

          "We left that=
 idiot Arrow in your CR Chamber, Plintissa." Stronghold said.

          "W=
HAT!?" Stranato yelled.

          "It's my base, and Arrow is welcome to b=
e repaired there and so are the other former Radicons!" Plintissa yelled.

=
          The Radicons nodded and walked on, Stranato grumbled out somethin=
g that none of them, could understand. Airbomber seen them and waved to the=
m. The People's Base's secret passageway was in the nearby swamp.

        =
  "Get ready!" Train Wreck said to Airbomber.

          "What about this g=
uy?" Airbomber asked.

          "Never mind him." Train Wreck said. Airbom=
ber drug Drazom out of the water and ushered him to come along while he wal=
ked with his comrades.

          Dracona was getting furious, and so was G=
angon.

          "Sorry Gangon, I did all I could, maybe BrightBlade will =
still show up anyway." Dracona said. Gangon waited while Dracona flew away.=


          "Hey! Wait! You forgot to untie meeeee!" Gangon screamed.

    =
      Dracona didn't hear and landed next to the People's Group members. Th=
e Radicons, Plintissa, Dracona, and Artist all entered the Poeple's base th=
rough the secret passage way, the computer reconizing them as friends. Trai=
n Wreck and Airbomber stepped into a door.

          "Hey, Stranato, look =
at this! It's amazing!" Train Wreck called out. Arrow steps out of the CR C=
hamber all healed up.

          "Yeah, it's got lots of beer and cigars in=
 here, too! and it's big enough to put a table in to play cards! How come w=
e never noticed this room before?" Airbomber said. Stranato walked into the=
 room. Stronghold and Blender followed.

          "Wait up guys!" Arrow ca=
lled out, running into the room. Plintissa sealed the door magnetically upo=
n order from Train Wreck, the Radicons were locked inside the room to sort =
out their problems. There was alot of banging, but it eventually stopped. A=
lot of name calling, too. Plintissa laughed and sat down at a table to play=
 cards with Dracona.

          "Oh, man! Not even a drop of beer in here! =
We'll dehydrate drinking water!" Stronghold said.

          "What are we g=
oing to do? Nothing to smoke!" Blender said.

          "I have more needs =
than all of you idiots put together! I'm getting fat and need to exercise!"=
 Stranato yelled.

          "How come we can't all get along! I don't like=
 it in here neither!" Arrow said. Stranato looked at him like he was going =
to kill him. Arrow cowered in the corner.

          "You see? That's why y=
ou fail, Arrow, you don't stand up against Stranato and his stupid rules! T=
his was our idea!" Train Wreck yelled.

          "Yeah, and nobody is gett=
ing out of here until we are all friends again." Airbomber said.

         =
 Stranato sighed in disapointment. Arrow stood up again, and started pacing=
 the room. Stronghold and Blender started to look in cracks in the wall for=
 something to drink, despite plenty of water in this room. Train Wreck was =
discussing something with Arrow and Airbomber, and Stronghold and Blender j=
oined them before long.

          "Say, you guys, it's really lonely sitti=
ng here with nothing to do, and--"

          "Shut up and get your ass ove=
r here! Of course you can join us!" Arrow said, cutting off Stranato. Stran=
ato walks over and sits with them. Stronghold pulls out a pack of playing c=
ards.

          Plintissa and Dracona smile to each other and walk up and =
out of the secret passgeway, taking a walk across a field...

-------------=
